upload.title: Upload
upload.upload_title: Drag an image to load it
upload.preview_title: Click on any image to preview it

getEmployees.title: Error loading information
getEmployees.message: We couldn't get the information, please try again later.

emplyNotFound.title: Employee not found
emplyNotFound.message: We were unable to retrieve information for this employee, please check the name and try again.

addedEmployee.title: Added employee
addedEmployee.message: A new employee has been created successfully.

addedEmployeeError.title: Error creating employee
addedEmployeeError.message: There was an error trying to create the new employee, please try again.

fileUploadError.title: Invalid file
fileUploadError.message: The type of file you are trying to upload is not valid, please check and try again.

repeatedFiles.title: Repeated file
repeatedFiles.message: We detected that the file you are trying to upload already exists, try a different one.
